items.name: utils
items.description: Utility function for merging class names with Tailwind CSS conflict resolution.

items.name: dynamic-icon
items.description: Dynamically load and render Lucide icons by name with automatic format transformation.

items.name: polymorphic
items.description: TypeScript utilities for building polymorphic components with the 'as' prop pattern.

items.name: qr-code
items.description: QR code component with label and description, styled for the design system.

items.name: recursive-clone-children
items.description: Recursively clone React children and inject props into components by display name.

items.name: block-theme
items.description: Theme utilities for blocks including color palettes, fonts, and tint levels.

items.name: block-context
items.description: Context provider for blocks with alternating backgrounds and surface styling.

items.name: block-decorations
items.description: Decoration components for blocks: overlays, patterns, gradients, and effects.

items.name: palettes
items.description: Color palette definitions for block theming with light and dark mode support.

items.name: typography
items.description: Typography preset definitions with display and body font configurations.

items.name: templates
items.description: Runtime template helpers for blocks-first architecture with block selection utilities.

items.name: block-header
items.description: Reusable section header component for blocks with badge, title, and description.

items.name: hero-text
items.description: Polymorphic hero text component with badge, title, and description for hero sections.

items.name: block-selection-context
items.description: React context for managing block selections in templates with alternatives.

items.name: use-animation-state
items.description: Hook for managing animation state with mobile detection and scroll-based animations.

items.name: use-colors
items.description: Hook for managing color format preferences and last copied color.

items.name: use-config
items.description: Hook for managing configuration state.

items.name: use-copy-to-clipboard
items.description: Hook for copying text to clipboard with optional timeout and callback.

items.name: use-layout
items.description: Hook and provider for managing layout state (fixed or full) with localStorage persistence.

items.name: use-media-query
items.description: Hook for detecting media query matches.

items.name: use-meta-color
items.description: Hook for managing meta theme color based on current theme.

items.name: use-mobile
items.description: Hook for detecting mobile devices using media query.

items.name: use-mounted
items.description: Hook for detecting if component is mounted (client-side).

items.name: use-mutation-observer
items.description: Hook for observing DOM mutations using MutationObserver API.

items.name: use-tab-observer
items.description: Hook for observing active tab changes in tab components.

items.name: use-content-pagination
items.description: Hook for infinite scroll pagination of content items with automatic loading on scroll.
